input.sentences: i was in a car accident .
my front bumper was ripped off !
the tire was torn off too .
the other car had a smashed front fender .
his mirror was knocked off too !
output.sentences: Carl had only had his car for four hours when someone ran a red light and hit him.
He felt sick when he saw how much damage there was.
He had no idea if the car would be totaled.
He almost felt  more sorry for the young girl who had hit him.
She was going to be in a pickle when her parents realized she had been texting while driving.
